text: Buddy Hackett (born Leonard Hacker on August 31, 1924 â€“ June 30, 2003) was an American actor and comedian. He appeared in Paulie (1998) as Artie. ==Early life== Hackett was born Leonard Hacker in Brooklyn, New York City, New York on August 31, 1924, the son of a Jewish upholsterer. ==Other websites== * * * Disney Legends profile * The final days: Buddy Hackett's last interview * Category:1924 births Category:2003 deaths Category:American Jews Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Actors from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City
